entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the teacher who will be handing out detentions to students with D's. He is described as smirking and sniggering at Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as one of the students who is laughing and making fun of others who got D's. He is described as sniggering along with Snape.

entities.name: harry

entities.name: hermione

entities.name: neville
